articles.title: Six Singapore bars on World's 50 Best Bars list, Jigger & Pony retains No. 9 spot - The Straits Times
articles.description: Singapore has the most number of bars in the list but it no longer holds the honour of having The Best Bar in Asia.. Read more at straitstimes.com.
articles.content:
SINGAPORE - Six Singapore bars are on this year's World's 50 Best Bars list - the most for any city - but the Republic no longer holds the honour of having The Best Bar in Asia.

articles.title: World Bank raises PHL growth forecast to 5.3% - BusinessWorld Online
articles.description: THE WORLD BANK raised its Philippine growth forecast for this year to 5.3% following the economy’s faster-than-expected expansion in the third quarter, it said in its East Asia and the Pacific (EAP) economic update report released on Tuesday.
